details.traditional: 只要功夫深，鐵杵磨成針

meanings.value: If you work at it hard enough, you can grind an iron bar into a needle.
cf idiom 磨杵成針|磨杵成针, to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle ; fig. to persevere in a difficult task
